head.title: Generate barcodes in {{FileFormatUp}} Documents via {{ProgLang}}
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} API allows developers to dynamically generate & insert Barcode images to documents & Email messages with ease.

header.title: Insert generated Barcodes in {{FileFormatUp}} Documents with our .NET API
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides complete support for dynamic Barcode image creation, editing and addition inside {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{ProgLang}} API.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdFullName}} overview
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is designed in order to generate documents and reports by adding various data from wide range of data sources. Populate with textual or numeric data objects like charts, tables, lists. Insert images or barcodes generated on the fly. Use sophisticated mark-up to insert data in the right place of a document. Over 50 document formats like PDF, MS Office, emails, etc. are supported.

more_features.title: Generate documents populating templates with data
more_features.description: The {{ProdFullName}} solution is engineered to provide service of documents generating across widely used formats. Add charts, lists, tables, hyper-links, images, barcodes using special markup and templates.

feature_1.title: Construct reports based on business data
feature_1.content: Our API provides efficient algorithms to populate document of popular office formats with data from well-known data source formats like JSON, XML, CSV, etc.

feature_2.title: Use visual object to represent your data
feature_2.content: {{ProdShortName}} supports many native data objects such as lists, tables, charts in business documents. Text, hyper-links, images or on the spot generated barcodes are available.

feature_3.title: Place data in any part of a document
feature_3.content: Use LINQ-based template syntax to insert data in a proper place. Data arrays may be placed with for-each syntax. It is possible to set up format (color, etc.) of data elements programmatically.

feature_4.title: Wide range of supported formats
feature_4.content: We provide access to processing many popular formats like MS Office, Open Office, PDF, Html, various email formats. Some documents may be inserted into other ones.

formats.title: Generate reports of popular formats
formats.description: {{EnvName}} supports reporting in more than 50 different formats. Effortlessly merge data and documents to have an excellent result.

operations.title: Inspect our main features
operations.description: We developed capable solution in order to help you with business documents

examples.comment_1: Use such template to insert a barcode to a document
examples.comment_4: Save result document with generated barcode

steps.title: How to add generated barcode to {{FileFormatUp}} document

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) allows to insert barcodes to many templates in popular formats like {{FileFormatUp}}. More than 60 barcode types are supported. One and two-dimensional barcodes are ready for processing.
content.step_2: Get data from the any supported data source.
content.step_3: Set up some additional properties like barcode dimensions or resolution.
content.step_4: Save the template with barcode as a new document.

code_1.title: How to generate a barcode on the fly
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to embed a generated barcode to {{FileFormatUp}} document.
